creditline: Gift of Donna and Cargill MacMillan Jr.
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: symmetrical, abstracted chicken form with head at left with red felt comb and waddle; gold beak; feathers at tail; patchwork of brocade fabrics on body with central cream-colored area embroidered with mouse and scrolling flowers; orange cord; grey backing
medium: Cotton, silk, metallic threads, felt, feathers
title: Pouch in the form of a chicken
